name: Deadliest Dance
description:
This is a rhythm game set in alternate reality earth where you will control one of four characters. Each character is identified distinctively by their looks and home stage and music. There is a narrative of combat through dance so expect some action based animation. and a fairly unique rock, paper, scissors system in use alongside the base rhythm-based gameplay.

Features:

  • Four themed stages with distinct music for gameplay
  • A rock, paper, scissors system integrated to base rhythm gameplay
  • A Crescendo bar to fill and unleash a devastating move and animation on opponents.
  • Three modes to play Story tournament, Training, and Versus.
